channel.title: Black Mesa Race Part 1
channel.description:
Hey there Black Mesa community. I hope this is posted in the correct place. Some of you may enjoy this video. A friend of mine and I play through BMS, get drunk, and reminisce.
This particular playthrough is a race. So some of the places will be seen in a blur, but that does not mean we don't fully appreciate it. :stuck_out_tongue:
Here is part 1
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iGHioEYjs4g']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iGHioEYjs4g[/url]
Part 2
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ufyNeDaVMN4&list=UUDuRXIqH-7Lom-x-KAxMO9w']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ufyNeDaVMN4&list=UUDuRXIqH-7Lom-x-KAxMO9w[/url]
Part 3
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4CQhEpNzNJY&list=UUDuRXIqH-7Lom-x-KAxMO9w']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4CQhEpNzNJY&list=UUDuRXIqH-7Lom-x-KAxMO9w[/url]
